attributes.action: Stop the Digital Switchover and Keep Analogue Television
attributes.additional_details: The Digital Switchover is to be complete in Britain by 2012, And some regions have already switched. But the Digital Switchover drains money out of citizens wallets and purses making them buy Terrestrial Freeview Boxes and subscribing to Satellite and Cable Services. Analogue Television should keep the usual channels but add about 40 more to keep the spirit alive.
